welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chaparral, where the desert meets stunning mountain views! Get ready to experience our warm hospitality, rich culture and diverse outdoor activities. We hope you thoroughly enjoy your stay and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at El Paso International Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and their regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C at El Paso International Airport is primarily used by United Airlines and their regional partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'ELP Free WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Biggs AAF Airport is used exclusively for military operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
